name: laravel/laravel
description: The skeleton application for the Laravel framework.

pre-autoload-dump: @php -r "\$staging = '/var/app/staging'; if (is_dir(\$staging)) { \$base = \$staging; if (!file_exists(\$base . '/storage/framework/views')) { mkdir(\$base . '/storage/framework/views', 0777, true); } if (!file_exists(\$base . '/storage/framework/cache')) { mkdir(\$base . '/storage/framework/cache', 0777, true); } if (!file_exists(\$base . '/storage/framework/sessions')) { mkdir(\$base . '/storage/framework/sessions', 0777, true); } if (!file_exists(\$base . '/storage/logs')) { mkdir(\$base . '/storage/logs', 0777, true); } if (!file_exists(\$base . '/bootstrap/cache')) { mkdir(\$base . '/bootstrap/cache', 0777, true); } }"
post-autoload-dump: @php -r "\$staging = '/var/app/staging'; \$current = getcwd(); foreach([\$staging, \$current] as \$base) { if (is_dir(\$base)) { foreach(['storage/framework/views', 'storage/framework/cache', 'storage/framework/sessions', 'storage/logs', 'bootstrap/cache'] as \$dir) { \$path = \$base . '/' . \$dir; if (!is_dir(\$path)) { mkdir(\$path, 0777, true); } } } }"
dev: npx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fb7185,#fdba74" "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:listen --tries=1" "php artisan pail --timeout=0" "npm run dev" --names=server,queue,logs,vite --kill-others
